00054 
00055 Range::Range(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr,
00056              const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00057              const RangeSpec *range, RangeSet *range_set,
00058              const RangeState *state)
00059     : m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr), m_identifier(*identifier),
00060       m_schema(schema_ptr), m_maintenance_in_progress(false),
00061       m_revision(0), m_latest_revision(TIMESTAMP_NULL), m_split_off_high(false),
00062       m_added_inserts(0), m_range_set_ptr(range_set), m_state(*state),
00063       m_error(Error::OK) {
00064   AccessGroup *ag;
00065 
00066   memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00067 
00068   if (m_state.soft_limit == 0 || m_state.soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00069     m_state.soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00070 
00071   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00072   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00073 
00077   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00078       m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00079     int cmp = strcmp(m_state.split_point, m_state.old_boundary_row);
00080     if (cmp < 0)
00081       m_split_off_high = true;
00082     else
00083       HT_ASSERT(cmp > 0);
00084   }
00085   else {
00086     String split_off = Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.SplitOff");
00087     if (split_off == "high")
00088       m_split_off_high = true;
00089     else
00090       HT_ASSERT(split_off == "low");
00091   }
00092 
00093   m_name = format("%s[%s..%s]", identifier->name, range->start_row,
00094                   range->end_row);
00095 
00096   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00097       && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00098 
00099   m_column_family_vector.resize(m_schema->get_max_column_family_id() + 1);
00100 
00101   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *sag, m_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00102     ag = new AccessGroup(identifier, m_schema, sag, range);
00103     m_access_group_map[sag->name] = ag;
00104     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00105 
00106     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *scf, sag->columns)
00107       m_column_family_vector[scf->id] = ag;
00108   }
00109 
00110   if (m_is_root) {
00111     MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema);
00112     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00113   }
00114   else {
00115     MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00116     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00117   }
00118 
00119   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Range object for " << m_name << " constructed\n"
00120                << *state << HT_END;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00126 Range::~Range() {
00127   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00128     delete m_access_group_vector[i];
00129 }

00136 void Range::load_cell_stores(Metadata *metadata) {
00137   AccessGroup *ag;
00138   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00139   uint32_t csid;
00140   const char *base, *ptr, *end;
00141   std::vector<String> csvec;
00142   String ag_name;
00143   String files;
00144   String file_str;
00145 
00146   metadata->reset_files_scan();
00147 
00148   while (metadata->get_next_files(ag_name, files)) {
00149     csvec.clear();
00150 
00151     if ((ag = m_access_group_map[ag_name]) == 0) {
00152       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized access group name '%s' found in METADATA for "
00153                 "table '%s'", ag_name.c_str(), m_identifier.name);
00154       HT_ABORT;
00155     }
00156 
00157     ptr = base = (const char *)files.c_str();
00158     end = base + strlen(base);
00159     while (ptr < end) {
00160 
00161       while (*ptr != ';' && ptr < end)
00162         ptr++;
00163 
00164       file_str = String(base, ptr-base);
00165       boost::trim(file_str);
00166 
00167       if (file_str[0] == '#')
00168         file_str = file_str.substr(1);
00169 
00170       if (file_str != "")
00171         csvec.push_back(file_str);
00172 
00173       ++ptr;
00174       base = ptr;
00175     }
00176 
00177     for (size_t i=0; i<csvec.size(); i++) {
00178 
00179       HT_INFOF("Loading CellStore %s", csvec[i].c_str());
00180 
00181       cellstore = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00182 
00183       if (!extract_csid_from_path(csvec[i], &csid)) {
00184         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_CELLSTORE_FILENAME,
00185                   "Unable to extract cell store ID from path '%s'",
00186                   csvec[i].c_str());
00187       }
00188       cellstore->open(csvec[i].c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(),
00189                       m_end_row.c_str());
00190       cellstore->load_index();
00191 
00192       if (cellstore->get_revision() > m_latest_revision)
00193         m_latest_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00194 
00195       ag->add_cell_store(cellstore, csid);
00196     }
00197 
00198   }
00199 
00200 }

00203 
00206 bool Range::extract_csid_from_path(String &path, uint32_t *csidp) {
00207   const char *base;
00208 
00209   if ((base = strrchr(path.c_str(), '/')) == 0 || strncmp(base, "/cs", 3))
00210     *csidp = 0;
00211   else
00212     *csidp = atoi(base+3);
00213 
00214   return true;
00215 }

00217 
00220 int Range::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00221   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"key="<< key <<" value='";
00222     const uint8_t *p;
00223     size_t len = value.decode_length(&p);
00224     _out_ << format_bytes(20, p, len) <<"'"<< HT_END;
00225 
00226   if (m_error)
00227     return m_error;
00228 
00229   if (key.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00230     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Bad column family ("<< (int)key.column_family_code <<") in "
00231         << m_identifier << HT_END;
00232     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00233   }
00234 
00235   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00236     for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00237          iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00238       (*iter).second->add(key, value);
00239   }
00240   else
00241     m_column_family_vector[key.column_family_code]->add(key, value);
00242 
00243   if (key.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00244     m_added_inserts++;
00245   else
00246     m_added_deletes[key.flag]++;
00247 
00248   if (key.revision > m_revision)
00249     m_revision = key.revision;
00250 
00251   return Error::OK;
00252 }

00255 
00256 CellListScanner *Range::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00257   bool return_deletes = scan_ctx->spec ? scan_ctx->spec->return_deletes : false;
00258   MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_ctx, return_deletes);
00259 
00260   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00261        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter) {
00262     if ((*iter).second->include_in_scan(scan_ctx))
00263       mscanner->add_scanner((*iter).second->create_scanner(scan_ctx));
00264   }
00265   return mscanner;
00266 }

00268 
00269 uint64_t Range::disk_usage() {
00270   uint64_t usage = 0;
00271   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00272     usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00273   return usage;
00274 }

00281 void
00282 Range::get_compaction_priority_data(
00283     CompactionPriorityData &priority_data_vector) {
00284   size_t next_slot = priority_data_vector.size();
00285 
00286   priority_data_vector.resize(priority_data_vector.size()
00287                               + m_access_group_vector.size());
00288 
00289   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00290     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(
00291         priority_data_vector[next_slot]);
00292     next_slot++;
00293   }
00294 }

00296 
00297 void Range::split() {
00298   String old_start_row;
00299 
00300   HT_ASSERT(m_maintenance_in_progress);
00301   HT_ASSERT(!m_is_root);
00302 
00303   try {
00304 
00305     switch (m_state.state) {
00306 
00307     case (RangeState::STEADY):
00308       split_install_log();
00309 
00310     case (RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED):
00311       split_compact_and_shrink();
00312 
00313     case (RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK):
00314       split_notify_master();
00315 
00316     }
00317 
00318   }
00319   catch (Exception &e) {
00320     // The maintenance queue will catch this exception and retry the split
00321     // It expects the maintenance_in_progress flag to be set, so the following
00322     // line is commented out
00323     //m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00324     throw;
00325   }
00326 
00327   HT_INFOF("Split Complete.  New Range end_row=%s", m_start_row.c_str());
00328 
00329   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 
00336 void Range::split_install_log() {
00337   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00338   char md5DigestStr[33];
00339 
00340   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00341     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, false);
00342 
00347   if (split_rows.size() < m_access_group_vector.size()) {
00348     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00349       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00350   }
00351   sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00352 
00367   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00368     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00369     m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00370     if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00371       split_rows.clear();
00372       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00373         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_rows(split_rows);
00374       if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00375         sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00376         m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00377         if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00378           m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00379           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00380                     "(a) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00381                     m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00382         }
00383       }
00384       else {
00385         m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00386         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00387                   "(b) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00388                    m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00389       }
00390     }
00391   }
00392   else {
00393     m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00394     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00395               "(c) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00396               m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00397   }
00398 
00399   m_state.set_split_point(m_split_row);
00400 
00404   md5_string(m_state.split_point, md5DigestStr);
00405   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00406   m_state.set_transfer_log(Global::log_dir + "/" + md5DigestStr);
00407 
00408   // Create transfer log dir
00409   try {
00410     Global::log_dfs->rmdir(m_state.transfer_log);
00411     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(m_state.transfer_log);
00412   }
00413   catch (Exception &e) {
00414     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating log directory '%s': %s",
00415               m_state.transfer_log, e.what());
00416     HT_ABORT;
00417   }
00418 
00422   {
00423     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00424     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00425     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00426       m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00427     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00428   }
00429 
00430   if (m_split_off_high)
00431     m_state.set_old_boundary_row(m_end_row);
00432   else
00433     m_state.set_old_boundary_row(m_start_row);
00434 
00438   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED;
00439   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00440     try {
00441       Global::range_log->log_split_start(m_identifier,
00442           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00443       break;
00444     }
00445     catch (Exception &e) {
00446       if (i<3) {
00447         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00448         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00449         continue;
00450       }
00451       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED meta log entry for %s "
00452                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00453       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00454     }
00455   }
00456 
00457   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00458     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-1");
00459 
00460 }

00463 
00467 void Range::split_compact_and_shrink() {
00468   int error;
00469   String old_start_row = m_start_row;
00470   String old_end_row = m_end_row;
00471 
00475   {
00476     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00477       if (m_access_group_vector[i]->compaction_initiated())
00478         m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(true);
00479   }
00480 
00481   try {
00482     String files;
00483     String metadata_key_str;
00484     KeySpec key;
00485 
00486     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00487 
00488     // For new range with existing end row, update METADATA entry with new
00489     // 'StartRow' column.
00490     metadata_key_str = String("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00491     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00492     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00493     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00494     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00495     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00496     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)m_state.split_point,
00497                      strlen(m_state.split_point));
00498     if (m_split_off_high) {
00499       key.column_family = "Files";
00500       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00501         key.column_qualifier = m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name();
00502         key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name());
00503         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_files(files);
00504         mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00505       }
00506     }
00507 
00508     // For new range whose end row is the split point, create a new METADATA
00509     // entry
00510     metadata_key_str = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_state.split_point);
00511     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00512     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00513     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00514     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00515 
00516     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00517     mutator_ptr->set(key, old_start_row.c_str(), old_start_row.length());
00518     if (!m_split_off_high) {
00519       key.column_family = "Files";
00520       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00521         key.column_qualifier = m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name();
00522         key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name());
00523         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_files(files);
00524         mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00525       }
00526     }
00527     else {
00528       key.column_qualifier = 0;
00529       key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00530       key.column_family = "Location";
00531       mutator_ptr->set(key, Global::location.c_str(),
00532                        Global::location.length());
00533     }
00534 
00535     mutator_ptr->flush();
00536 
00537   }
00538   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00539     // TODO: propagate exception
00540     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Problem updating METADATA after split (new_end="
00541         << m_state.split_point <<", old_end="<< m_end_row <<") "<< e << HT_END;
00542     // need to unblock updates and then return error
00543     HT_ABORT;
00544   }
00545 
00550   {
00551     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00552     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_scans(m_scan_barrier);
00553 
00554     // Shrink access groups
00555     if (m_split_off_high)
00556       HT_ASSERT(m_range_set_ptr->change_end_row(m_end_row,
00557                                                 m_state.split_point));
00558     {
00559       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00560       String split_row = m_state.split_point;
00561 
00562       // Shrink access groups
00563       if (m_split_off_high)
00564         m_end_row = m_state.split_point;
00565       else
00566         m_start_row = m_state.split_point;
00567 
00568       m_name = String(m_identifier.name) + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row
00569         + "]";
00570       m_split_row = "";
00571       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00572         m_access_group_vector[i]->shrink(split_row, m_split_off_high);
00573 
00574       // Close and uninstall split log
00575       if ((error = m_split_log_ptr->close()) != Error::OK) {
00576         HT_ERRORF("Problem closing split log '%s' - %s",
00577                   m_split_log_ptr->get_log_dir().c_str(),
00578                   Error::get_text(error));
00579       }
00580       m_split_log_ptr = 0;
00581     }
00582   }
00583 
00587   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK;
00588   if (m_split_off_high) {
00590     {
00591       char md5DigestStr[33];
00592       String table_dir, range_dir;
00593 
00594       md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), md5DigestStr);
00595       md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00596       table_dir = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + m_identifier.name;
00597 
00598       foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *ag, m_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00599         // notice the below variables are different "range" vs. "table"
00600         range_dir = table_dir + "/" + ag->name + "/" + md5DigestStr;
00601         Global::dfs->mkdirs(range_dir);
00602       }
00603     }
00604 
00605   }
00606 
00607   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00608     try {
00609       Global::range_log->log_split_shrunk(m_identifier,
00610           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00611       break;
00612     }
00613     catch (Exception &e) {
00614       if (i<3) {
00615         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00616         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00617         continue;
00618       }
00619       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_SHRUNK meta log entry for %s "
00620                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00621       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00622     }
00623   }
00624 
00625   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00626     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-2");
00627 
00628 }
00629 
00630 
00634 void Range::split_notify_master() {
00635   RangeSpec range;
00636   uint64_t soft_limit = m_state.soft_limit;
00637 
00638   if (m_split_off_high) {
00639     range.start_row = m_end_row.c_str();
00640     range.end_row = m_state.old_boundary_row;
00641   }
00642   else {
00643     range.start_row = m_state.old_boundary_row;
00644     range.end_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00645   }
00646 
00647   // update the latest generation, this should probably be protected
00648   m_identifier.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00649 
00650   HT_INFOF("Reporting newly split off range %s[%s..%s] to Master",
00651            m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00652 
00653   if (soft_limit < Global::range_max_bytes) {
00654     soft_limit *= 2;
00655     if (soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00656       soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00657   }
00658 
00659   m_master_client_ptr->report_split(&m_identifier, range,
00660                                     m_state.transfer_log, soft_limit);
00661 
00667   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00668     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-3");
00669 
00670   m_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00671 
00675   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00676     try {
00677       Global::range_log->log_split_done(m_identifier,
00678           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00679       break;
00680     }
00681     catch (Exception &e) {
00682       if (i<2) {
00683         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00684         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00685         continue;
00686       }
00687       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_DONE meta log entry for %s "
00688                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00689       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00690     }
00691   }
00692 
00693   m_state.clear();
00694 
00695   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00696     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-4");
00697 }
00698 
00699 
00700 void Range::compact(bool major) {
00701   try {
00702     run_compaction(major);
00703   }
00704   catch (Exception &e) {
00705     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00706     m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00707     throw;
00708   }
00709 
00710   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00711 }
00712 
00713 
00714 void Range::run_compaction(bool major) {
00715 
00716   {
00717     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00718     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00719     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00720       if (major || m_access_group_vector[i]->needs_compaction())
00721         m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00722     }
00723   }
00724 
00725   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00726     if (m_access_group_vector[i]->compaction_initiated())
00727       m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(major);
00728 }
00729 
00730 
00731 void Range::recovery_finalize() {
00732 
00733   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED) {
00734     CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader_ptr =
00735         new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00736     replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get());
00737     commit_log_reader_ptr = 0;
00738 
00739     // re-initiate compaction
00740     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00741       m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00742 
00743     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00744     m_split_row = m_state.split_point;
00745     HT_INFOF("Restored range state to SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED (split point='%s' "
00746              "split log='%s')", m_state.split_point, m_state.transfer_log);
00747   }
00748 
00749   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00750     m_access_group_vector[i]->recovery_finalize();
00751 }
00752 
00753 
00754 void Range::dump_stats() {
00755   String range_str = (String)m_identifier.name + "[" + m_start_row + ".."
00756                       + m_end_row + "]";
00757   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00758   uint64_t cached = 0;
00759   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00760     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00761     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00762   }
00763   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded inserts\t" << m_added_inserts
00764        << endl;
00765   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded row deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[0]
00766        << endl;
00767   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cf deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[1]
00768        << endl;
00769   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cell deletes\t"
00770        << m_added_deletes[2] << endl;
00771   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded total\t"
00772        << (m_added_inserts + m_added_deletes[0] + m_added_deletes[1]
00773            + m_added_deletes[2]) << endl;
00774   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcollisions\t" << collisions << endl;
00775   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcached\t" << cached << endl;
00776   cout << flush;
00777 }
00778 
00779 void Range::get_statistics(RangeStat *stat) {
00780   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00781   uint64_t cached = 0;
00782   uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
00783   uint64_t memory_usage = 0;
00784 
00785   stat->added_inserts = m_added_inserts;
00786   stat->added_deletes[0] = m_added_deletes[0];
00787   stat->added_deletes[1] = m_added_deletes[1];
00788   stat->added_deletes[2] = m_added_deletes[2];
00789 
00790   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00791     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00792     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00793     disk_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00794     memory_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->memory_usage();
00795   }
00796 
00797   stat->collided_cells = collisions;
00798   stat->cached_cells = cached;
00799   stat->disk_usage = disk_usage;
00800   stat->memory_usage = memory_usage;
00801 
00802 
00803 
00804   {
00805     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00806 
00807     stat->table_identifier = m_identifier;
00808 
00809     RangeSpec spec;
00810     // these may change during a shrink
00811     spec.start_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00812     spec.end_row = m_end_row.c_str();
00813 
00814     stat->range_spec = spec;
00815   }
00816 }
00817 
00818 
00819 void Range::lock() {
00820   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00821        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00822     (*iter).second->lock();
00823   m_revision = 0;
00824 }
00825 
00826 
00827 void Range::unlock() {
00828 
00829   {
00830     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00831     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00832       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00833   }
00834 
00835   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00836        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00837     (*iter).second->unlock();
00838 }
00839 
00840 
00841 
00844 void Range::replay_transfer_log(CommitLogReader *commit_log_reader) {
00845   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00846   const uint8_t *base, *ptr, *end;
00847   size_t len;
00848   ByteString key, value;
00849   Key key_comps;
00850   size_t nblocks = 0;
00851   size_t count = 0;
00852   TableIdentifier table_id;
00853 
00854   m_revision = 0;
00855 
00856   try {
00857 
00858     while (commit_log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
00859 
00860       ptr = base;
00861       end = base + len;
00862 
00863       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00864 
00865       if (strcmp(m_identifier.name, table_id.name))
00866         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_COMMIT_LOG,
00867                   "Table name mis-match in split log replay \"%s\" != \"%s\"",
00868                   m_identifier.name, table_id.name);
00869 
00870       while (ptr < end) {
00871         key.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00872         key_comps.load(key);
00873         ptr += key_comps.length;
00874         value.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00875         ptr += value.length();
00876         add(key_comps, value);
00877         count++;
00878       }
00879       nblocks++;
00880     }
00881 
00882     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00883       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00884 
00885     {
00886       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00887       HT_INFOF("Replayed %d updates (%d blocks) from split log '%s' into "
00888                "%s[%s..%s]", (int)count, (int)nblocks,
00889                commit_log_reader->get_log_dir().c_str(),
00890                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00891     }
00892 
00893     m_added_inserts = 0;
00894     memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00895 
00896   }
00897   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00898     HT_ERRORF("Problem replaying split log - %s '%s'",
00899               Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00900     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00901       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00902     throw;
00903   }
00904 }
00905 
00906 
00907 
00910 int64_t Range::get_scan_revision() {
00911   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00912   return m_latest_revision;
00913 }
